trans-unit.source: Implemented by the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> class to determine if the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.AutoCompleteAttribute" /> class attribute is set to <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" /> for a remote method invocation.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> 類別 (Class) 實作，用於判斷 Remote Method Invocation 的 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.AutoCompleteAttribute" /> 類別屬性是設為 <see langword="true" /> 還是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch> interface does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch>不需要直接在您的程式碼中實作介面。

trans-unit.source: It is used internally by the .NET Framework infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 它會在內部使用的.NET Framework 基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.AutoCompleteAttribute> class attribute ensures that, in the COM+ context, the object's done bit is automatically set to `true` once the method returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.AutoCompleteAttribute>類別屬性可確保，在 COM + 內容中，物件的完成的位元會自動設為`true`一旦方法會傳回。

trans-unit.source: The object can then be deactivated.
The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch> interface methods do not appear in the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> class interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch>介面方法未出現在<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent>類別介面。

trans-unit.source: A string to be converted into a request object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換成實作 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" /> 介面之要求物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that, in the COM+ context, the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> class object's done bit is set to <see langword="true" /> after a remote method invocation.
trans-unit.target: 確保在 COM+ 內容中，<see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> 類別物件的 done 位元會在 Remote Method Invocation 之後設為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A string converted from a response object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 從實作 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage" /> 介面之回應物件轉換而來的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch.RemoteDispatchAutoDone%2A> method does not belong to the published interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> class and does not need to be implemented elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch.RemoteDispatchAutoDone%2A>方法未隸屬於已發行介面<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent>類別，並不需要其他地方實作。

trans-unit.source: A string to be converted into a request object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換成實作 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" /> 介面之要求物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: Does not ensure that, in the COM+ context, the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> class object's done bit is set to <see langword="true" /> after a remote method invocation.
trans-unit.target: 不能確保在 COM+ 內容中，<see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> 類別物件的 done 位元會在 Remote Method Invocation 之後設為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A string converted from a response object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 從實作 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage" /> 介面之回應物件轉換而來的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch.RemoteDispatchNotAutoDone%2A> method does not belong to the published interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> class and does not need to be implemented elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch.RemoteDispatchNotAutoDone%2A>方法未隸屬於已發行介面<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent>類別，並不需要其他地方實作。
